Test Cases: The date can't be a future date in "From Date" field
Test Steps: 1) Enter any future date after today's date in the "From Date" field
Expected Result: Manger/ Customer can only add todayâ€™s date as a maximum date in "From Date" field
Actual Result: Manger/ Customer can add future date after today's date in "From Date" field

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to the next field

Test Cases: From Date can't be greater than To Date
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid date in the "To Date" field (02 May 2023)
Expected Result: An error message "From Date field must be less than To Date field" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Enter a valid date in the "From Date" field but greater than the "To Date" field (25 May 2023)
3) Press TAB and move to the next field

4) Enter a valid "Number of Transactions"
5) Click on the "Submit" button
